context: Unity grew popular for mobile and indie game development. iPhone App Store created new game market. Unity's accessibility and cross-platform support attracted developers.

competitors.name: Unreal Engine
competitors.notes: Industry leader for AAA games, higher learning curve

competitors.name: CryEngine
competitors.notes: Known for Crysis graphics, 'Can it run Crysis?' meme

competitors.name: Cocos2d
competitors.notes: Open source framework for 2D mobile games
